description:
Sakamaki Izayoi, Kudou Asuka, and Kasukabe You, all possess skills greater than the average person.   When they are summoned away to Little Garden, they are offered the deal of a life time.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Des adolescents à problèmes ont débarqué dans le jardin miniature ?
Mondaiji-tachi ga Hakoniwa ni Yattekita You Desu yo?
Problem Children Are Coming from Another World, Aren`t They?
問題児たちが箱庭にやって来たようですよ?
